participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys the quiet moments of life.
participant_1.background: I am a painter. My favorite band is the Beastie Boys. I love coffee with cream. I went to New York City once.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, with a penchant for the unconventional.
participant_2.background: If I were to be reincarnated, I'd want to come back as a hippopotamus. I smoke two packs of cigarettes most days. I enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee. I could eat meatloaf every night and never get tired of it. I can't get enough of Lindsey Stirling's music.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to paint, read, and listen to music.
That sounds cool! I like to paint too. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is the Beastie Boys.
Nice! I've heard of them but I've never listened to them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a hip hop group from the 80s and 90s.
Oh, I've heard of them. I didn't know they were a hip hop group.
Yeah, they were pretty popular back in the day.
What's your favorite song by them?
Oh, that's a good one. I like that song too.
What kind of paintings do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and still lifes.
Oh, that's cool! I've never been very good at painting.
It's not that hard to learn. Just takes some practice.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
I would love to see your paintings if you ever paint any.
Sure, I'll let you know if I ever do.
